title: Жить жизнь
overview: Anna Boginskaya knows firsthand how manipulations ruin lives. After a painful relationship filled with cruelty and masterly lies, the heroine realizes that she has turned out to be a pawn in a large-scale game. And the rules are set within the walls of a closed club, where guys are taught the art of seduction. Will the girl learn more from the revelations of the mysterious Sofia, who so surprisingly resembles herself in her youth? In a desperate attempt to save others from their fatal mistakes, Boginskaya is forced to face the ghosts of the past and figure out whether her feelings for Matthew are true love or their relationship is just a painful addiction.
